name: Froslass
description: The Snow Land Pokémon. It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees F. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Hail damage. It's AC is increased by 2 in arctic conditions, or when it is snowing or hailing.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: When hit by a melee attack, this Pokémon may roll 1d4. On a result of 4, the opponent who made the attack cannot use the same move on its next turn.
